title: reliable testing with pip constraints
description:
pip freeze files and similar techniques like buildout have been used for
reliable testing and reliable deployments for some time. But they are
not flexible enough to deal with situations like OpenStack where there
are dozens of separate codebases, evolving independently, which still
need the same rigour and reliability.

Enter pip constraints, new in 7.1.0. I will cover their use, design, and
how we're using them in devstack (and thus OpenStack CI) - and how you
can (and should) use them in your local projects.
